leaflet.candidateName: Roy Freshwater, Mick Pendergast, Mike Yates

messages.content: Working hard for you in Peninsula Ward

messages.title: We agree!
messages.content: Are you sick and tired of out of touch Conservative, Labour and Lib Dem councillors from Chatham, Rainham, and Gillingham making decisions which disproportionately affect our communities here on the Hoo Peninsula?

messages.title: Mark Reckless: A Powerful and Independent Voice for the Hoo Peninsula
messages.content: Mark has track-record of standing up for the Hoo Peninsula. He defeated Boris Johnson's bonkers airport plans and forced Lodge Hill plans to be called in.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Pushing for a more visible Police presence in our villages
Introducing a Freedom Pass for young and old

mentions.candidate: Roy Freshwater, Mick Pendergast, Mike Yates, Mark Reckless

issues.environment: defeated Boris Johnson's bonkers airport plans

leaflet.additionalNotes: PENINSULA WARD DESERVES BETTER. VOTE UKIP.
